title: [build cop] Support for different SDF versions in gz sdf command line tool might need to be deprecated

content.raw:
This came up while moving to depend on SDF5 on pull request #2621.

Function `sdf::SDF::Version(<number>)` was deprecated on the following sdformat pull request:

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/295/remove-sdf4-deprecations-and-bump-to-500/diff#chg-include/sdf/SDFImpl.hh

Actually, now looking back at the pull request, I can't remember what was the motivation for deprecating those functions. It might make sense to bring them back.
content.html:
This came up while moving to depend on SDF5 on pull request #2621.

Function sdf::SDF::Version(<number>) was deprecated on the following sdformat pull request:

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/295/remove-sdf4-deprecations-and-bump-to-500/diff#chg-include/sdf/SDFImpl.hh

Actually, now looking back at the pull request, I can't remember what was the motivation for deprecating those functions. It might make sense to bring them back.
